passives.name: Spellblade
passives.effects: After using an [[Champion ability|ability]], your next basic attack within 10 seconds deals {{as|75% '''base''' AD}} {{as|(+ 10% AP)}} {{as|'''bonus''' magic damage}} on-hit and applies {{tip|on-hit}} effects to the target again after a {{fd|0.2}}-second delay ({{fd|1.5}} second cooldown, starts after using the empowered attack).

effects_structured.raw: After using an [[Champion ability ability]], your next basic attack within 10 seconds deals {{as 75% '''base''' AD}} {{as (+ 10% AP)}} {{as '''bonus''' magic damage}} on-hit and applies {{tip on-hit}} effects to the target again after a {{fd 0.2}}-second delay ({{fd 1.5}} second cooldown, starts after using the empowered attack).

schema_notes.effects_structured: Parsed from passive/active text for simulation use.
context_notes: Spellblade also repeats on-hit effects after 0.2 seconds.
